channel.title: Sketch - Arcs on The CAD Coder
channel.description: Recent content in Sketch - Arcs on The CAD Coder

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create Centerpoint Arc
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create a Centerpoint Arc through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create Tangent Arc
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create a Tangent Arc through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create 3-Point Arc
item.description: In this post, I tell you about how to create a 3-Point Arc through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

item.title: Solidworks Macro - Create Polygon
item.description:
In this post, I tell you about how to create a Polygon through Solidworks VBA Macros in a sketch.

The process is almost identical with previous Sketch - Create Tangent Arc post.
